aboutWork: A Project based on VR automobile design software with Oculus and stylus support. Packed with exceptional features, meticulously crafted through rigorous research.

Discover a UAE-based platform on Google Playstore and Apple Store, connecting enthusiasts to buy, sell, and indulge in dream vehicles. With seamless selling and user-friendly interface, elevate your automotive passion today.

Conducted a comprehensive UX challenge on Domino's app, featuring detailed case study integrating heuristic evaluation, card sorting, and PET analysis. Simplified user-centric approach enhancing app usability and overall customer experience.

A UI/UX application for managing solid waste, addressing the principles of manage, reduce, reuse, and recycle. Simplifies waste management with intuitive features, promoting eco-friendly practices for a sustainable future.
